channel.title: New JDK 6U1 Help [Pics Included]
channel.description:
[b]JDK 6U1[/b]
Step 1: Create a new folder and call it "Java" without the quotations. [IMG]http://img105.imageshack.us/img105/6531/folderlq0.png[/img]
Step 2: [url=http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp]http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp[/url] click link to Download JDK 6U1 and click the same download like how the image says.. [IMG]http://img376.imageshack.us/img376/1258/step1qh3.png[/img]
Step 3: A message will then pop up and you click yes [IMG]http://img105.imageshack.us/img105/4085/clickyeskl2.png[/img]
Step 4: Then you click accept liecence and agreement then the same message as step 3 will appear click yes again. [IMG]http://img105.imageshack.us/img105/927/clickhereip7.png[/img]
Step 5: Click the Offline Version as the picture Shows Below [IMG]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/2029/clickhere1rw7.png[/img]
Step 6: Then save, save it to the Java folder that you created earlier [IMG]http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/2/clickhere2ih1.png[/img] [IMG]http://img262.imageshack.us/img262/1341/clickhere3si9.png[/img]
Step 7: Once everything is done go onto your server folder and right click the compliler and click edit Delete all the information in there and add this one
[code]@echo off title Compiler set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.1\bin\java.exe" pause[/code]
Save and Close it. Thats it you have a Working Compiler with JDK 6U1
[b]Any Problems Post![/b]

item.title: New JDK 6U1 Help [Pics Included]
item.dc:creator: @haz_system haz system
item.description:
@haz_system wrote:

JDK 6U1

Step 1: Create a new folder and call it “Java” without the quotations.

Step 2: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp click link to Download JDK 6U1 and click the same download like how the image says…

Step 3: A message will then pop up and you click yes

Step 4: Then you click accept liecence and agreement then the same message as step 3 will appear click yes again.

Step 5: Click the Offline Version as the picture Shows Below

Step 6: Then save, save it to the Java folder that you created earlier

Step 7: Once everything is done go onto your server folder and right click the compliler and click edit
Delete all the information in there and add this one

@echo off title Compiler set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.1\bin\java.exe" pause

Save and Close it.
Thats it you have a Working Compiler with JDK 6U1

Any Problems Post!

Read full topic
